name: Alaya & Soad's Gift
subtitle: Quranic Stories & Learning for All Ages
description:
Alaya & Soad's Gift brings the beautiful stories of the Quran to life through AI-powered storytelling, interactive learning, and a dedicated kids mode.

A LOVING TRIBUTE
Built as a memorial, this app brings Quranic wisdom to families through engaging stories, beautiful recitations, and interactive learning.

KEY FEATURES:

PROPHET STORIES
Explore the stories of 24 prophets from the Quran. Each story is thoughtfully narrated with AI, covering themes of patience, leadership, family, justice, and miracles.

KIDS MODE
A safe, age-appropriate environment for children to learn about prophets through interactive stories with illustrations and audio narration. Parents control access through a secure parent gate.

QURAN READER & RECITATION
Read the complete Quran with 20+ reciters. Listen to beautiful recitations while following along with Arabic text and translation.

AI TUTOR
Ask questions about Quranic stories, Islamic history, and faith. Your personal AI tutor provides thoughtful, accurate answers.

OFFLINE FIRST
Download stories and recitations for offline access. Perfect for learning anywhere - on trips, at the mosque, or at home.

MULTILINGUAL
Available in Arabic, English, and more languages. Automatic language detection ensures the best experience.

ISLAMIC TOOLS
Prayer times, Qibla direction, and other useful Islamic utilities built right in.

PERFECT FOR:
- Families wanting to teach children about the Quran
- Muslims seeking to deepen their understanding
- Students of Islamic studies
- Anyone interested in the stories of the prophets

FREE vs PREMIUM:

FREE:
- All prophet stories
- Basic Quran reader
- 3 AI tutor sessions per day
- 5 kids lessons per day

KIDS PREMIUM ($4.99/month or $39.99/year):
